name: CST
description:
We are professional IT service company, specializing in custom software development. We deliver state of the art IT solutions in the areas of Big Data/Hadoop, Blockchain, Web, Cloud & Infrastructure development, DevOps. Our professional IT services include, software architecture & development, end-to-end product and platform development, system administration and support
Our mission is to implement clients’ vision into high quality, functional and reliable software.
